title: Feedback on a script 'y'
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419084003im_/http:/typophile.com/files/yogabomb_3627.png)

I'd like any opinions please on the y character in the above image.  
I've highlighted the area of (my) concern – I'm reasonably happy with it but also very close to it.  
I'd like to keep the line a single weight to support the idea of the bomb's fuse.

Thank you...
